channel.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
channel.description:
I think it's an awesome movie. It's really gruesome and contains a lot of violence and language lol. Basically, there are these two children, brother and sister, and they get abandoned and find a witch's house and get captured. They escape and kill that witch and become witch hunters. They really can only be killed if you burn or decimate them. So, the witches main plan is to make so they can't be burnt. I don't want to say anymore for those who have not seen it yet. I advise watching it if you like violent movies. Anyway, here's the trailer for it.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9246msCh7x4

item.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:2, topic:520036”]Watched 2 night ago. Good concept and all but it was delivered poorly. The only memorable part about it was Gemma Arterton, she was smoking, mhmm mmm… Another up is Jeremy Renner, he was a good choice. Overall I would give it a 7/10

Also, if you want another good Hansel and Gretel movie watch; Hansel and Gretel Get Baked. Very funny[/quote]
That movie isn’t funny at all lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Watched 2 night ago. Good concept and all but it was delivered poorly. The only memorable part about it was Gemma Arterton, she was smoking, mhmm mmm… Another up is Jeremy Renner, he was a good choice. Overall I would give it a 7/10

Also, if you want another good Hansel and Gretel movie watch; Hansel and Gretel Get Baked. Very funny

Read full topic
